body_content.explanation: a person who uses their right hand to write, etc.:
examples: My mother was a righty and was never happy that I used my left hand to write with.
I'm usually a lefty but was taught to play tennis by a righty, so that's how I ended up playing tennis right-handed.

body_content.explanation: in the game of baseball, a player who pitches (= throws) the ball with their right hand :
examples: I find it much easier to hit homers from a righty.
The righty's fastball was clocked at 86 mph, so fast but not that fast.
